channel.title: [PI] Npcdrops.TSM HELP! [PI]
channel.description:
heey i got a problem with NPCdrop.tsm
oke this the problem ppl say its like (NPC):(dropRatio) (item):(amount) (item:amount) ....................................
oke my first question is how comes then if the drop ratio is 30% it gives like evry 4 kils money and evry 1000 kils d claws :|
and i changed the drop ratio to 100 and still dont work can someone explain and help me with this
add Mitchvandenakker2@hotmail.com
thanks

item.title: [PI] Npcdrops.TSM HELP! [PI]
item.dc:creator: @collin123456 collin123456
item.description:
@collin123456 wrote:

so u have it like this:?

npcid:dropration d claws id: 1 etc random id:1 …
random id:1 etc?

if so i believe the items on the second line are the rarer 1s (if i remember correctly)

sorry if this doesn’t help
